snippet: Quick — when you are nonvulnerable, which scores more: six spades redoubled and made with an overtrick, or seven spades doubled and made? What if you are vulnerable?
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at Mitchell Open Board-a-Match Teams at Fall Nationals in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: Quick — when you are nonvulnerable, which scores more: six spades redoubled and made with an overtrick, or seven spades doubled and made? What if you are vulnerable?
